channel.title: Nulls
channel.description: I was just wondering how to get rid of all nulls in my server?

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Make this your antilag class:

import java.io.*;


public class antilag {

    public int ResetTimer = 0;

    public void resetserver() {
        misc.println("[Lag Handler]: Kicking Nulls.");
        PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
        misc.println("[Lag Handler]: Nulls Kicked.");
        ResetTimer = 0;
    }

    public void process() {
        ResetTimer += 1;
        if (ResetTimer >= 100) {
            resetserver();
        }
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Go to method process and add this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("null")) { disconnected = true; System.out.println("[SERVER]: Disconnected a null"); }
